item.title: Proposals
item.description: Submitting proposals to the DAO is pretty easy and anyone can do it. There are 3 types of proposals: PIP: Pocket Improvement Proposal PEP: Pocket Ecosystem Proposal PUP: Pocket Update Proposal Posting your proposal to Discourse puts it up for consideration and debate by the DAO.
